# --description-- Now that you have the CSS in the `styles.css` file, go ahead and remove the `style` element and all its content. Once it is removed, the text that was centered will shift back to the left. # --hints-- You should not have any `style` tags in your code. ```js assert(!code.match(/style/i)); ``` You should not have any CSS selectors in your HTML file. ```js (getUserInput) => { const html = getUserInput('editableContents'); assert(!html.includes('style')); assert(!html.includes('text-align')); } ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html --fcc-editable-region-- Cafe Menu --fcc-editable-region--

CAMPER CAFE

Est. 2020

Coffee

``` ```css h1, h2, p { text-align: center; } ```
